pkgmetadata.longdescription: readme======.. warning:: The readme library was renamed to readme_renderer to work around an installation issue that could prevent it from being installed on some systems. Use the readme_renderer_ library instead.Readme is a library that will safely render arbitrary README files into HTML.It is designed to be used in Warehouse_ to render the ``long_description`` for packages... _Warehouse: https://github.com/pypa/warehouse.. _readme_renderer: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/readme_rendererCheck Description Locally-------------------------To check your long description's locally simply install the readme libraryusing:.. code-block:: console $ pip install readme $ python setup.py check -r -s
